name: Say my name
description:
Inspired from the amazing Breaking Bad franchise, Say my name is a reproduction of the popular Breaking Bad scene in which Heisenberg has the well-known line "Say my name".

Most of the sprites were made with the AI image generator DALL-E, then made pixel art with Pixelator. Special thanks goes to the creators of these platforms.

Remix of Breaking Bad's soundtrack made by DEAD BATTERY.

You're goddamn right.
